short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Showcases a stylish black car parked near the waterfront as the city skyline glows sunset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The transition between day and night, along with the calm waters and shimmering city lights, evokes a sense of modern sophistication and quiet anticipation. This background is ideal for those who love the elegance of nightfall and the dynamic energy of the city.
